li.label: permanently feral
li.description: AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH I'M A DOG FOREVER (also you should never see this thought)

li.label: was a wild animal
li.description: I was trapped as a beast, mindless and feral! I'm human again, but I don't think I'll get over this for a long time.

li.label: was a sapient animal

li.label: was a mad animal

li.label: no longer an animal
li.description: I'm human again? But c'mon, that wa awesome! Put me back in, coach!

li.label: permanently feral
li.description: I shouldn't have this thought, but it was exhilarating to know I'd never turn back.

li.label: was a wild animal
li.description: I was trapped as a beast, mindless and feral! I'm human again, but the experience was...not as bad as I thought?

li.label: was a sapient animal
li.description: I'm glad to be human again. I didn't know what to do as a beast, but it did give me some valuable perspective.
